content: Pod 51 and Row NYC Hotel do not offer free breakfast. However, they both have on-site restaurants and coffee shops where you can purchase breakfast or grab a coffee to go. Additionally, there are many affordable breakfast options available in the surrounding area, such as bagel shops and coffee carts. Both hotels also have communal kitchens where guests can prepare their own meals. If you're looking for a hotel that offers free breakfast, you may want to consider options like Holiday Inn Express, Comfort Inn, and Hampton Inn, all of which offer complimentary breakfast to guests.
